# Do you wish your websites would fly faster and still you paid a very affordable price?

Check out [High CPU web hosting plans from SimpleVM with CloudLinux, Control Panel and Clustering support on board!](https://simplevm.net/vip/)

Try any of our hosting plans _for free for 7 days_ and see if it works for your needs.
> Use **50lifetime** promo code to receive 50% off for a lifetime of your order. That would be as low as $2.5/month

CL-1 is our starter plan

* Unlimited Domains
* Unlimited DNS
* Unlimited Databases
* 50 % CPU
* 1 CPU Core
* 1 GB Dedicated RAM
* 5 GB SSD HDD SPACE
* Unlimited Monthly traffic
* 50 Processes
* 1 IPv4 + 1 IPv6 IP
* ISPmanager 5 Business Panel
* Weekly Backup
* 7-day Free Trial

Please [email our sales department](https://simplevm.net/contacts/) if you have any questions. We are available to assist you along the way.

Have a wonderful and productive week ahead!
